title: (x) Handwritten font with personality - Handwriting {Patricia}
content:
Can anyone help identify this handwriting font?   
I googled at length and examined hundreds of handwriting fonts but the closest I could get to it was Tiza or Freely, but neither have the energy or individuality of this one? Any takers?   
   
 ![Handwriting font with energy and personality](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143418im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35702.gif)
author: fkj

comments.content:
And here's an image of the full alphabet.   
Someone on another forum recognized the above sample and actualy had a copy of the full alphabet. However they could not put a name to the font. (In the alphabet image it seems to be called just 'Handwriting',which is not too useful.)   
   
 ![Personality font alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143418im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35705.gif)

It is a font called "Handwriting". I have it too, but of course if you google it, that's no help. It's credited ï¿½ Sam Wang 1991 Shareware   
   
Try [this link](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143418/http:/www.graphic-design.com/Type/Fonts-Fonts/scripts/handwrite.html).
Patricia, that's great. Thanks for your help.
